titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office building located at 680 State Highway 130 in Hamilton, New Jersey, as the "John K. Rafferty Hamilton Post Office Building".
To designate the United States Post Office building located at 680 U.S. Highway 130 in Hamilton, New Jersey, as the "John K. Rafferty Hamilton Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. McHugh moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1374.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Thompson without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 474.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 10/12/1999--Passed House amended. Designates the U.S. Post Office building located at 680 U.S. Highway 130 in Hamilton, New Jersey, as the John K. Rafferty Hamilton Post Office Building.
